title: On a pixel phone how can I add a new note to wunderlist using Google assistant?
content:
I used to be able to say " make a note to finish that project"  and Google assistant would create a new task in Wunderlist called " finish that project".  Something changed about a month ago and this no longer works.  
Does anyone know how to fix this?
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3
